state.description: The state of the custom rule. Default is Enabled

action.description: Describes what action to be applied when rule matches

priority.description: Describes priority of the rule. Rules with a lower value will be evaluated before rules with a higher value

rateLimit.description: Enables and configures a rate limit mechanism for the rule

matchConditions.description: A list of conditions that must be met for the actions to be executed

CustomRule.description: Defines contents of a web application rule

CustomRuleActionType.description: Describes the override action to be applied when custom rule matches

values.name: Log
values.description: Allow the request and log it

values.name: AnomalyScoring
values.description: Use Anomaly Scoring to decide wether to allow or deny

negationCondition.description: Whether this is negate the condition. Default is false

EnabledState.description: Describes whether an object (a policy, a custom rule, a managed rule set or other objects) is enabled or disabled

selectorMatchOperator.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operate on the selector to specify which elements in the collection this exclusion applies to

selector.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operator used to specify which elements in the collection this exclusion applies to

ruleGroups.description: Exclusion scope. If not specified, then the exclusion is applied to the entire rule set

Exclusion.description: Allow to exclude some variable satisfy the condition for the WAF check

ExclusionMatchVariable.description: Variable variants that can be excluded when defining an Exclusion

ExclusionSelectorMatchOperator.description: Comparison operators variants that can be used with Exclusion variables when defining an Exclusion

matchValue.description: This condition is met if the matchValue is one of the matchVariable's keys

ExistsMatchCondition.description: Defines a custom rule condition of type Exists

ExistsOperatorVariable.description: Defines the supported operator variables for an operation of type Exists

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation

policies.description: The list of back references to policies that use this Geo list

GeoListResourceId.description: A type definition that refers the id to an ARM resource.

GeoMatchCondition.description: Defines a custom rule condition of type Geo

GeoOperatorVariable.description: Defines the operator variables for the Geo match operation

IpListUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the IpList.

ipList.description: The list of IP addresses and ranges

IpListUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the IpList.

matchValue.description: A list of mutually disjoint IP addresses or CIDR ranges (IPv4 or IPv6)

IpMatchCondition.description: Defines a custom rule condition of type Ip

IpOperatorVariable.description: Defines the operator variables for the Ip match operation

state.description: The state of the log scrubbing config. Default value is Enabled

scrubbingRules.description: The rules that are applied to the logs for scrubbing

LogScrubbing.description: Log scrubbing configuration, to allow certain variables to be scrubbed on WAF logs

state.description: The state of the rule set. Default is Enabled

ruleSetType.description: Defines the rule set type to use

ruleSetVersion.description: Defines the version of the rule set to use

ruleGroupOverrides.description: Defines the rule group overrides to apply to the rule set

exclusions.description: The exclusions that are applied on the managed rule set

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The Policy items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PolicyListResult.description: The response of a Policy list operation.

values.name: Prevention
values.description: The policy is in prevention mode. Requests are inspected and not blocked accordingly

values.name: Detection
values.description: The policy is in detection mode. Requests are inspected but not blocked

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation

protectedEndpoints.description: The list of endpoints this policy protects

logScrubbing.description: Rules for scrubbing sensitive log fields

customRules.description: The custom rules inside the policy

state.description: The state of the policy. Default value is Enabled

mode.description: The mode of the policy. Default value is Detection

redirectUrl.description: If action type is redirect, this field represents redirect URL for the client

customBlockResponseStatusCode.description: If the action type is block, customer can override the response status code

customBlockResponseBody.description: If the action type is block, customer can override the response body. The body must be specified in base64 encoding

requestBodyCheck.description: Describes if policy managed rules will inspect the request body content. Default value is Enable

maxRequestBodySizeInKb.description: Maximum request body size in Kb for WAF

fileUploadLimitInMb.description: Maximum file upload size in Mb for WAF

PolicyTagsUpdate.description: The type used for updating tags in Policy resources.

endpointId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the endpoint to protect

attachmentState.description: The status of the last attachment operation between the policy and the endpoint

ProtectedEndpointId.description: A type definition that refers the id to an ARM resource.

protectedEndpoints.description: List of endpoints to attach/detach to the policy, or that are currently protected by the policy

ProtectedEndpointList.description: Request or response body of endpoints attachment/detachment operation

ProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of a resource type

values.name: Provisioning
values.description: Provisioning the resource is in progress

values.name: Accepted
values.description: The change request has been accepted

limitType.description: Rate limiting is done based on the limit type

durationInMinutes.description: Time window for resetting the rate limit count. Default is 1 minute

maxRequestsPerSecond.description: Max number of allowed requests per limit type, within the defined duration

RateLimit.description: Describes the rate limit configuration of a rule

values.name: ClientIp
values.description: Rate limiting is done based on the client IP

values.name: Geo
values.description: Rate limiting is done based on the geographic location of the request

values.name: DestinationIp
values.description: Rate limiting is done based on the destination IP

ruleGroupName.description: The managed rule group to override

RuleGroupOverride.description: Defines a managed rule group override setting

rules.description: Relevant rules within the specified rule group. If not specified, the scope is the entire rule group.

RuleGroupScope.description: Defines a rule group scope, which can be the entire rule group or a subset of rule within it

state.description: The state of the managed rule or rule group

action.description: Overrides the action to be applied when a rule matches

RuleOverride.description: Defines a managed rule group override setting

state.description: Defines the state of log scrubbing rule. Default value is Enabled

matchVariable.description: The variable to be scrubbed from the logs

selectorMatchOperator.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operate on the selector to specify which elements in the collection this rule applies to

selector.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operator used to specify which elements in the collection this rule applies to

ScrubbingRule.description: Allow certain variables to be scrubbed on WAF logs

ScrubbingRuleMatchVariable.description: Supported variable types for scrubbing rules

values.name: RequestHeaderNames
values.description: The request headers to be scrubbed

values.name: RequestCookieNames
values.description: The request cookies to be scrubbed

values.name: RequestArgNames
values.description: The request arguments to be scrubbed

values.name: RequestPostArgNames
values.description: The request post arguments to be scrubbed

values.name: RequestJSONArgNames
values.description: The request JSON arguments to be scrubbed

state.description: The state of the managed rule or rule group

action.description: Overrides the action to be applied when a rule matches

StateAndActionOverride.description: Defines a managed rule or rule group override

operator.description: String operator to use when matching with the match values

selector.description: Match against a specific key from RequestHeader, PostArgs and RequestCookies. Default is Null

matchValue.description: The condition is met if any of the values match the variable with the given operator

transformations.description: Describes what transforms applied before matching

StringMatchCondition.description: Defines a custom rule condition of type String

StringOperator.description: Operators that can be applied in conditions of type String

StringOperatorVariable.description: Defines the supported operator variables for string operations

StringSizeNumberOperatorVariable.description: Defines the supported operator variables for string, size and number operations

TransformType.description: Transforms that can be applied before matching

WafActionType.description: Supported action that can be applied if a rule matches

values.description: Log the request and allow it
